blogPost.title: What advice would you give to entrepreneurs interested in the space industry? Answer by @awaisahmedna, CEO @PixxelSpace. https://t.co/rHIG1IbpXr https://t.co/nKNweDm9jn
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 宇宙産業に興味のある起業家にアドバイスをお願いします。Answer by @awaisahmedna, CEO @PixxelSpace. https://t.co/rHIG1IbpXr https://t.co/nKNweDm9jn
你会给对太空行业感兴趣的企业家提出什么建议？回答者：@awaisahmedna, CEO @PixxelSpace. https://t.co/rHIG1IbpXr https://t.co/nKNweDm9jn
你會給對太空行業感興趣的企業家提出什麼建議？回答者：@awaisahmedna, CEO @PixxelSpace. https://t.co/rHIG1IbpXr https://t.co/nKNweDm9jn

previous.title: What is some good career advice for members of Gen Z, as they enter the working world? Answer by @RobKingyens, Founder & CEO at https://t.co/FmvM87k26i. https://t.co/l1X7tMGCQe https://t.co/X0BZiRNW0Y

localize.full_text: Z世代のメンバーが社会人になる際に、キャリアに関する良いアドバイスはありますか？回答者： @RobKingyens, Founder & CEO at https://t.co/FmvM87k26i. https://t.co/l1X7tMGCQe https://t.co/X0BZiRNW0Y
对于Z世代的成员，在他们进入工作领域时，有什么好的职业建议？回答者：@RobKingyens, 创始人& CEO at https://t.co/FmvM87k26i. https://t.co/l1X7tMGCQe https://t.co/X0BZiRNW0Y
對於Z世代的成員，在他們進入工作領域時，有什麼好的職業建議？回答者：@RobKingyens, 創始人& CEO at https://t.co/FmvM87k26i. https://t.co/l1X7tMGCQe https://t.co/X0BZiRNW0Y

next.title: How do you carve out time for yourself during this pandemic while also juggling childcare and work? Answer by @annekate, Co-founder & CPO of @Winnie. https://t.co/DSJJdhQ2jA https://t.co/nSLLw3S9o0

localize.full_text: 育児と仕事を両立させながら、このパンデミックの中でどのように自分の時間を確保していますか？Answer by @annekate, Co-founder & CPO of @Winnie. https://t.co/DSJJdhQ2jA https://t.co/nSLLw3S9o0
在这种大流行病中，你如何为自己挤出时间，同时还要兼顾照顾孩子和工作？回答者：@annekate, 联合创始人& CPO of @Winnie. https://t.co/DSJJdhQ2jA https://t.co/nSLLw3S9o0
在這種大流行病中，你如何爲自己擠出時間，同時還要兼顧照顧孩子和工作？回答者：@annekate, 聯合創始人& CPO of @Winnie. https://t.co/DSJJdhQ2jA https://t.co/nSLLw3S9o0
